https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/2pOIMOAsi2zPAWzf0sy2Zk9BSTp.jpg Abraham and his female friend Álex have a close relationship; they share both secrets and fears. When Abraham starts going out with Anchi, he begins to distance himself from Álex, who gradually dives into a living hell where she encounters strange apparitions, nightmarish visions and extreme situations.
